Index.meta_title: Sonava - Modular SaaS Solutions to Empower Your Business
Index.meta_description: Discover Sonava's scalable, adaptable SaaS platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses. Build, automate, and grow with ease.

Hero.title: Empower your business with <important>Sonava's Modular SaaS Platform</important>.
Hero.description: Simplify operations, automate workflows, and scale with our adaptable SaaS solutions. Perfect for small and medium-sized businesses.

Features.section_description: Our modular SaaS platform adapts to your business needs, offering flexibility, seamless integrations, and cost-effective scaling.
Features.feature_description: Sonava provides a tailored SaaS experience, ensuring your business stays ahead in a competitive market.

Pricing.section_description: Choose a pricing plan that grows with your business. From startups to industry leaders, Sonava has you covered.

PricingPlan.free_plan_description: Ideal for startups and small teams

FAQ.question: How does Sonava's modular platform benefit my business?
FAQ.answer: Sonava's modular design ensures you only pay for the features you need, with the flexibility to scale and adapt as your business grows.

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
CTA.description: Join thousands of businesses leveraging Sonava's SaaS platform for smarter, faster growth.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: Vous n'avez pas les permissions pour effectuer cette action

SignIn.meta_description: Connectez-vous à votre compte avec facilité.

SignUp.meta_description: Créez un compte sans effort grâce à notre processus d'inscription intuitif.

Dashboard.meta_description: Manage your Sonava account and settings with our intuitive dashboard interface.

DashboardIndex.title_bar_description: Welcome to your personalized Sonava dashboard
DashboardIndex.message_state_description: Customize your experience by managing your account settings, features, and integrations.
